text: Gloria Frances Stewart (July 4, 1910 â€“ September 26, 2010) also known as Gloria Stuart, was an American actress. She was one of the actors who set up the Screen Actors Guild. She became famous again when she had a part in the 1997 movie Titanic. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California Category:American centenarians Category:American silent movie actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American radio actors
